channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Lilium was once a promising 'air taxi' startup worth billions. Now it's on the brink of insolvency
item.description: German aerospace startup Lilium faces insolvency if it doesn't raise emergency funding from the state government for the southeastern state of Bavaria...

item.title: The defunct AmazonSmile charitable program worked. I know because I co-founded Tripadvisor using the same principles
item.description: Tripadvisor's success is a testament to human generosity and the power of‬ collective impact.

item.title: Coca-Cola is about to report earnings. Here's what to expect
item.description: Shares of Coke have climbed 18% this year, raising the company's market value to nearly $300 billion.

item.title: Deutsche Bank shares fall on third-quarter loan losses but profits rise
AT&T posts subscriber beat, but stock falls as company takes a big charge
McDonald’s stock falls as Quarter Pounders linked to E. coli outbreak, CDC says
Trump aims to turn out hardcore partisans and men while Harris goes after 10% still persuadable in final campaign sprint
item.description: One point on which both camps agree: The election will be decided by voters in just seven swing states.

item.title: Rudy Giuliani ordered to give 2 Georgia election workers he defamed his NYC apartment and a 1980 Mercedes once owned by Lauren Bacall
item.description: They won the $148 million judgment over Giuliani’s false ballot fraud claims against them related to the 2020 presidential election.

item.title: Frontier reportedly considering renewed merger talks with Spirit Airlines
U.S. fines American Airlines record $50 million over treatment of disabled passengers
item.description: The U.S. Transportation Department on Wednesday said it was fining American Airlines a record $50 million for its treatment of disabled passengers.

item.title: German court rules against Deutsche Bank in Postbank acquisition lawsuit
item.description: Deutsche Bank said it will now analyze the judgement and noted it has booked provisions covering all outstanding claims by the plaintiffs, including i...

item.title: The elusive number keeping Treasury yields at their highest levels in 3 months

item.description: It's also resumed "limited" driverless testing in Houston.

item.title: Baird downgrades McDonald's after E. coli outbreak
item.description: It's time to move to the sidelines on shares of McDonald's as the company grapples with an E. coli outbreak tied to some of its U.S. restaurants, Bair...

item.title: Keir Starmer shrugs off Trump’s accusation that the Labour Party is meddling in U.S. elections—but insists he wants to remain friends
item.description: “The interference is occurring in plain sight,” the letter from the Trump campaign’s legal team says.
